thread.title: UAE- Eltizam Asset Management Group receives ISQEM safety award
thread.title_full: UAE- Eltizam Asset Management Group receives ISQEM safety award | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: UAE- Eltizam Asset Management Group receives ISQEM safety award
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) Eltizam Asset Management Group has won the ISQEM safety award from the International Safety Quality Environment Management Association, becoming one of the first UAE-based asset management companies to win the prestigious honour.

Eltizam won the international distinction from the UK-based professional association for demonstrating leadership commitment in managing and improving safety standards of its team in the workplace. The international distinction follows Eltizam's achievement of 14 different awards and certifications earned during the past year, the first of its establishment.

Chris Roberts, Executive Director of Eltizam Asset Management Group, said, "We are delighted to be recognised for our stringent adherence to the highest standards of workplace safety and for proactively safe-guarding the well-being of our staff members. This award validates our ongoing commitment to our clients in implementing best-in-class safety management systems and services in facility management and meeting the standards set by professional organisations such as the International Safety Quality Environment Management Association.

"The President of ISQEM, Wayne Taylor, commended Eltizam Asset Management Group on its success, and said, "The international Safety Management Awards reflect the importance of aiming for optimum standards of health and safety at work. EAMG should be justifiably proud of its achievement."

Eltizam Asset Management Group is a professional body of companies specialised in the acquisition, operation and care of physical assets. The group's services include asset and community management, as well as critical and non-critical facility management, in addition to sales and leasing services across the UAE.
